overview_summary: All four neighboring landowners have no documented public stance on development (all noted_stance are Unknown). None are known community leaders or officials, so high-influence neighbors are absent – most appear to have low individual influence locally.

neighbors.name: Steven J. & Francesca Brennan
neighbors.claims: Steven J. Brennan and his wife Francesca live in Tucson, Arizona, and own a parcel in Cochise County ([veripages.com](https://veripages.com/name/Francesca/Brennan/#:~:text=Lives%20in%201593%20N%20Mariposa,6070)). They are absentee landowners with no record of local civic engagement or publicly stated views on development ([veripages.com](https://veripages.com/name/Francesca/Brennan/#:~:text=Lives%20in%201593%20N%20Mariposa,6070)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Contact them via phone or email, emphasizing how the project could maintain or enhance property values and minimize any impact on their land.

neighbors.name: Lodestar Investments LC
neighbors.claims: Lodestar Investments LC is a limited liability company listed as owner of parcel 106-15-012T in Cochise County. The company’s principals are not identified in local records, indicating the land is held as an investment by an outside party ([ecorp.azcc.gov](https://ecorp.azcc.gov/BusinessSearch/BusinessInfo?entityNumber=23247916#:~:text=Title%20%20,7%2F16%2F2021)).

approach_recommendations.engage: If needed, reach the company’s representative through formal channels, focusing on business considerations and regulatory compliance.

neighbors.name: Patsy J. Moriarty
neighbors.claims: Patsy J. Moriarty is listed as the owner of Cochise County parcel 106-47-058A ([parcelinquirytreasurer.cochise.az.gov](https://parcelinquirytreasurer.cochise.az.gov/?ra=GISMap&rc=Parcel#:~:text=Cochise%20County%20Treasurer%20,Center)). No references to her in news articles or public meetings could be found, suggesting she has not voiced a position on local development issues ([www.cochise.az.gov](https://www.cochise.az.gov/174/Clerk-of-the-Board#:~:text=Clerk%20of%20the%20Board%20,Public%20%26%20Legal%20Notices)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Meet with her in person on her property, showing respect for her rural lifestyle and listening to any concerns she may have about changes in the area.

neighbors.name: Adam Chabal
neighbors.claims: Adam Chabal owns parcel 106-47-058B in Cochise County ([parcelinquirytreasurer.cochise.az.gov](https://parcelinquirytreasurer.cochise.az.gov/?ra=GISMap&rc=Parcel#:~:text=Cochise%20County%20Treasurer%20,Center)). There is no public information on Chabal taking part in local boards or forum discussions, and no stated opinions on development were found ([www.cochise.az.gov](https://www.cochise.az.gov/174/Clerk-of-the-Board#:~:text=Clerk%20of%20the%20Board%20,Public%20%26%20Legal%20Notices)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out directly to introduce the project and ask for his input, as he has no known stance. A straightforward, personal approach can help address any questions from this relatively new neighbor.
